mapper.select: select * from (select ROWNUM RN, reservations.*from (select rownum ,res_num resNum, res_pername resPername, res_pernum resPernum, res_date resDate, res_chkin resChkin, res_chkout resChkout, res_tel resTel, res_email resEmail, res_pay resPay, res_price resPrice, room_num roomNum, user_id userId from reservations order by resNum DESC) reservations)reservations where RN between #{start} and #{end}

select res_num resNum, res_pername resPername, res_pernum resPernum, res_date resDate, res_chkin resChkin, res_chkout resChkout, res_tel resTel, res_email resEmail, res_pay resPay, res_price resPrice, room_num roomNum, user_id userId from reservations where res_num = #{resNum}
mapper.insert: insert into reservations values ( reservationnum_seq.nextval, #{resPername}, #{resPernum}, sysdate, #{resTel}, #{resEmail}, #{resChkin}, #{resChkout}, '예약 진행 중', #{resPay}, #{resPrice}, #{roomNum}, #{userId} )
